title: ITDC Notification 2025 - Apply Online for Medical Officer Post
description: India Tourism Development Corporation (ITDC) has released the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Medical Officer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, MD/ MS can grab this chance and apply for the ITDC Notification 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can apply online before the end date of the application. If you are look...
